messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is essential to your own security and prosperity.

messages.title: THAT’S WHY I DECIDED WE NEED AN ELECTION NOW
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security. That means delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.

messages.title: THE CHOICE IS CLEAR
messages.content: So the choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond. Or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is essential to your own security and prosperity.
issues.economy: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.
issues.education: a good school place for every child
issues.health: a strong economy paying for a strong NHS

images.caption: Rt. Hon THERESA MAY Prime Minister

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Alan Mabbutt on behalf of the Conservative Party.
